Doc: This defines the time interval to the start of the exercise period, i.e. the earliest exercise date, and the frequency of subsequent exercise dates (if any).

Source.Contents:
/#
   This defines the time interval to the start of the exercise period, i.e. the earliest exercise date, and the frequency of subsequent exercise dates (if any).
 #/
record FpML5.confirmation.ExercisePeriod {
  # The time interval to the first (and possibly only) exercise date in the exercise period.
  earliestExerciseDateTenor : FpML5.confirmation.Period

  # The frequency of subsequent exercise dates in the exercise period following the earliest exercise date. An interval of 1 day should be used to indicate an American style exercise period.
  exerciseFrequency : FpML5.confirmation.Period?

  id : string?

}

earliestExerciseDateTenor.Doc: The time interval to the first (and possibly only) exercise date in the exercise period.
earliestExerciseDateTenor.Name: earliestExerciseDateTenor

exerciseFrequency.Doc: The frequency of subsequent exercise dates in the exercise period following the earliest exercise date. An interval of 1 day should be used to indicate an American style exercise period.
exerciseFrequency.Name: exerciseFrequency
